lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did Saul do while the men stoned Stephen?
answers: He took care of their coats

questions.text: Why did Saul go from house to house in Jerusalem?
answers: To invite people to the temple

questions.text: Why was Saul going to Damascus?
answers: To find more Christians to throw in jail
To trade goods in the market

questions.text: Who did Saul meet on the road to Damascus?
What did Saul see and hear?
answers: A bright light, and Jesus saying, 'Why are you opposing Me?'

questions.text: After meeting Jesus, Saul was not able to...?
What did God tell Ananias to do?
answers: Go to Saulâ€™s house and put his hands on him

questions.text: What happened when Ananias put his hands on Saul?
answers: Saul could see again and was filled with the Holy Spirit

questions.text: What did Saul begin to do after he was filled with the Holy Spirit?
answers: Preach the good news about Jesus

questions.text: When the Jewish leaders wanted to kill Saul, how did he escape?
answers: In a basket through a window in the city wall
He dug a tunnel under the city walls
